mapper.insert: insert into UserLiterature(userID, literatureID, title, collectTime, year, venue) values(#{userID}, #{literatureID}, #{title}, current_date(), #{year}, #{venue} )
mapper.select: select literatureID, count(*) citation from UserLiterature group by literatureID order by count(*) desc limit 0,10
select title, year, venue from UserLiterature where literatureID = #{literatureID} limit 0,1
